title: Listen for control messages using reliable() transport option (TCP), remove unreliable()

content.raw: With the synchronization plugin, lost messages will block the simulation and can result in loss of synchronization between the field computer and the simulation. It would be preferable if in order arrival of control messages is guaranteed by the simulation. As only subscribers can set the transport options, this needs to be done on the simulation side.
